overview:
Scott is the founder of EnerTech Capital and has been an energy technology investor for more than 13 years. Scott’s specific areas of interest include opportunities in power generation, transmission and distribution, smart grid, distributed generation, motive power and nano-materials.

Prior to EnerTech, Scott spent 16 years as a power industry executive with Atlantic Electric. During his tenure at Atlantic, he rose through the engineering department to become President and COO of the company’s non-regulated enterprises and an officer of the parent corporation. While leading the non-regulated division, Atlantic Energy Enterprises (“AEE”), Scott was responsible for creating three new businesses and managing assets that generated more than $200 million in annual revenue. Prior to AEE, Scott was the Director of Corporate Strategy and Business Development and oversaw the creation of the organization’s M&A strategy that eventually led to the merger of Atlantic Energy with Delmarva Power.

Scott currently sits on the boards of CoaLogix, CURRENT Group, Intellon and The NanoSteel Company. Scott formerly sat on the boards of Catalytic Solutions (L: CTS), Clean Air Power (L: CAP), Comverge (COMV) and Enerwise. Scott is also a member of the Battelle Energy Advisory Council and a former member of the Cleantech Venture Network Advisory Board.
